description: This recipe is by Elaine Louie and takes 40 minutes, plus 6 to 24 hours for soaking the beans and rice before cooking. Tell us what you think of it at The New York Times - Dining - Food.
title: Mung Bean Pancakes
title_page: Mung Bean Pancakes Recipe - NYT Cooking
